name: Electric screen simulator
description:
Put your finger on the screen for an awesome lightning effect. For each touch, amazing and realistic smoke appears. Also an electric sound can be heard in this game.

Our electric screen simulator was created mainly for entertainment. You can use it for fun or as a way to get rid of stress. Your friends will envy you, none of them have an application with electric lightning like this one.

Because it is very realistic, you can entertain kids or friends with your phone or tablet. Everybody might be amazed when touching your device. Find your own way to use it, be creative and enjoy it.

Remember: No electric currents are in this game even though it has realistic smoke and lightning. Use it safely and enjoy!
